      • clickElementNth

        public void clickElementNth(String page,
                   String element,
                   int n)
        To be used when there are multiple occurrences of an element.
        Example: There are 10 checkboxes with same locator expression, and 5th one needs to be clicked.
        Pass 'page', 'checkBoxElement', 5.
        Specified by:
        clickElementNth in interface IAction
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -
        n - n > 0

                                               List<String> attributesList)

        Specified by:

        element -
        attribute -
        Returns:

      • getAttributeValue

        public String getAttributeValue(String page,
                       String element,
                       String attribute,
                       int elementIndex)
        Returns attribute's value for the element located by page->element, 'elementIndex'th element is considered if there are many elements located by same locator. If a single element is expected to be located, send elementIndex=0
        Specified by:
        getAttributeValue in interface IAction
        Parameters:
        page - - "SRP"
        element - - "pivotBarAllLinks"
        attribute - - example: href, data-bak,..
        elementIndex - - >= 0

      • clickElementMatchingAttribValue

        public void clickElementMatchingAttribValue(String page,
                                   String element,
                                   String attribute,
                                   String value)
        To be used when page->element points to a list of elements, and specific element to be clicked could be identified by an attribute's value.
        If index of the specific element is known, then clickElementNth could be used.
        Specified by:
        clickElementMatchingAttribValue in interface IAction
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -
        attribute -
        value -
